name: The Lab (itch) (grippelYT)
description:
(Keep in mind this is a prequal to "The Hut")

In this game u play as a scientist having to work the night shift at Loocitare labs, the very, VERY secret lab that no one knows about.  u have to give food to subject 277 and keep it in check.

can u keep subject 277 in its cage?
